# pylint: disable=C0103
"""
This file contains the configuration data for the 2.2-kW induction motor drive.

"""
# %%
from __future__ import annotations
from dataclasses import dataclass
import numpy as np
from model.im_drive import SaturationModel


@dataclass

[docs]class ModelData:
    """
    System model data.

    """

[docs]    name: str = '2.2-kW induction motor drive'


[docs]    motor_type: str = 'induction motor'

    # Gamma-model parameters

[docs]    R_s: float = 3.7


[docs]    R_r: float = 2.5


[docs]    L_ell: float = .023


[docs]    L_s: float = .245


[docs]    p: int = 2

    # Saturation model

[docs]    saturation: bool = not True


[docs]    L_su: float = .34


[docs]    beta: float = .84


[docs]    S: float = 7

    # Mechanics

[docs]    J: float = .015


[docs]    B: float = 0


[docs]    w_M0: float = 0  # Initial rotor speed


[docs]    theta_M0: float = 0  # Initial rotor angle

    # Converter system data

[docs]    pwm: bool = False  # PWM disabled to fasten the simulation

    # Parameters for the stiff DC-bus voltage

[docs]    constant_dc_voltage = True  # Enable constant DC-bus voltage


[docs]    u_dc: float = 540  # DC-bus voltage

    # Parameters needed with the diode bridge model

[docs]    C: float = 235e-6


[docs]    L: float = 2e-3


[docs]    u_g: float = np.sqrt(2/3)*400


[docs]    w_g: float = 2*np.pi*50

    # Computational delay

[docs]    delay: int = 1




[docs]mdl_pars = ModelData()
